Rulings.Base:
1. Removing this card and the other face-up monster you control from play is a cost.
2. This effect targets the Synchro Monster to be Special Summoned.
3. This effect activates on the field.
4. You can remove from play Tokens or an "Embodiment of Apophis" that is being treated as a monster to activate this effect.
5. [TEXT] The text for this card is different in the DREV Rulings Document than on the card itself.

PSCT.Base: You can remove from play this face-up card, and 1 face-up monster you control, to select 1 Synchro Monster in your Graveyard with a Level less than or equal to the combined original Levels of the other 2 monsters. Special Summon that Synchro Monster.
